name: Ori
dexEntry: A small feline predator that scratches everything with his claws, but can purr to calm friends.

moves.name: Purring Calm
moves.description: Once per turn, when this Pokémon is hit by an attack, you may prevent all effects of that attack, including damage.

moves.name: Clawed Swipe
moves.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
